alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waupaca; Waushara (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 12:10AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Portage, western Waushara and southwestern Waupaca Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1209 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles east of Amherst to near Waupaca to 8 miles northwest of Westfield. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Chain O` Lakes-King around 1215 AM CDT. Waupaca around 1220 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Wautoma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
